bactromod.options.title: BactroMod Settings
bactromod.options.gamma.description: Boosts in-game brightness by set factor.
bactromod.options.pumpkinblur.descriptio: Disables black texture overlay that strongly limits view when player wears a carved pumpkin.
bactromod.options.fireoffset.description: Moves fire texture in height. Usually you would select a negative value to move fire texture down and free up your view.
bactromod.options.shieldoffset.descripti: Moves shield in height when in first-person perspective. Usually you would select a negative value to move shield down and free up your view.
bactromod.options.boatmap.description: Allows maps to always be shown when moving in boat.
bactromod.options.lavafog.description: Disables fog caused by diving into lava.
bactromod.options.snowfog.description: Disables fog caused by diving into powder snow.
bactromod.options.blindnessfog.descripti: Disables fog caused by blindness effect.
bactromod.options.darknessfog.descriptio: Disables fog caused by darkness effect.
bactromod.options.waterfog.description: Disables fog caused by diving into water.
bactromod.options.windowborders.descript: Enables dark window border in Minecraft (only on Windows 11).
